lexUnit.name: drunk.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: affected by alcohol to the extent of losing control of one's faculties or behaviour

sentence.text: Anyway , at last I got absolutely blind drunk through depression , went upstairs to Freda 's bedroom and cried myself to sleep .
